Colors

  1. Colors

Colors

The look and feel of our company and product relies on using a handful of specific colors that help convey meaning and purpose.

Branding

.swatch-brand-primary $brand-primary: #677895;

.swatch-ns-blue $ns-blue: #1F4598;

.swatch-ns-gold $ns-gold: #C6922C;

.swatch-ns-brown-gold $ns-brown-gold: #998d57 !default;

Defaults

Just showing the defaults for these. These shouldn’t really be re-used for other purposes other than what they are already doing.

$body-bg; #1D2747;

$default-link-color: #244296;

$text-color: #555555;

Status

.swatch-success $brand-success: $5CB85C;

.swatch-warning $brand-warning: $F0AD4E;

.swatch-danger $brand-danger: $D9534F;

.swatch-info $brand-info: $5BC0DE;

Grayscale

.swatch-gray-light $brand-gray-light:#999;

.swatch-gray $brand-gray: #767676;

.swatch-gray-dark $brand-gray-dark: #333;
